attributes.action: form a parents panel that can advise the Child Support Agency about practices from their own experiences
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I think there should be a parents advisory panel attached to the Child Support Agency.

I think giving the parents the opportunity to speak and give their real life experiences with the Child Support Agency, both good and bad, could help produce a better agency for all.

This should include resident and non-resident parents - both mothers and fathers alike.

Everyone should be have a say and point of view.
